    • Constructor Detail

      • BaasDocumentLoader

        public BaasDocumentLoader(android.content.Context context,
                  java.lang.String collection,
                  Filter filter)
        Stores away the application context associated with context. Since Loaders can be used across multiple activities it's dangerous to store the context directly; always use Loader.getContext() to retrieve the Loader's Context, don't use the constructor argument directly. The Context returned by Loader.getContext() is safe to use across Activity instances.
        Parameters:
        context - used to retrieve the application context.
